entry.string: Modify Multisites Configuration
entry.translation: Mudeeffy Moolteesites Cunffeegooreshun

entry.string: Set Multisite Configuration
entry.translation: Set Moolteesite-a Cunffeegooreshun

entry.string:
This option will gather some server configuration data and then modify your main config.system.php file. Once this is complete, this site will become the Master site from which you can create other (sub)sites. Usually this operation is only carried out once. If there is a change in your server configuration, you may need to reconfigure this Master site using this option.

Before you continue, please make sure that you
entry.translation:
Thees oopshun veell gezeer sume-a serfer cunffeegooreshun deta und zeen mudeeffy yuoor meeen config.system.php feele-a. Oonce-a thees is cumplete-a, thees seete-a veell becume-a zee Mester seete-a frum vheech yuoo cun creete-a oozeer (soob)seetes. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Usooelly thees oopereshun is oonly cerreeed oooot oonce-a. Iff zeere-a is a chunge-a in yuoor serfer cunffeegooreshun, yuoo mey need tu recunffeegoore-a thees Mester seete-a useeng thees oopshun.

Beffure-a yuoo cunteenooe-a, pleese-a meke-a soore-a thet yuoo

entry.string: Create the Master Data folder '$masterfolder' in your main Xaraya install directory. This is where your(sub)site configuration information is stored. If you wish to change the name of the Master Data Folder, make sure you update the name in the form below to your Master Data folder name. Important: Make sure your Master Data folder is writable chmod777 before you continue.
entry.translation: Creete-a zee Mester Deta fulder '$masterfolder' in yuoor meeen Xereya instell durectury. Bork bork bork! Thees is vhere-a yuoor(soob)seete-a cunffeegooreshun inffurmeshun is stured. Iff yuoo veesh tu chunge-a zee neme-a ooff zee Mester Deta Fulder, meke-a soore-a yuoo updete-a zee neme-a in zee furm beloo tu yuoor Mester Deta fulder neme-a. Impurtunt: Meke-a soore-a yuoor Mester Deta fulder is vreeteble-a chmud777 beffure-a yuoo cunteenooe-a.

entry.string: Chmod 666 your main config.system.php file so this module can write to it.
entry.translation: Chmud 666 yuoor meeen config.system.php feele-a su thees mudoole-a cun vreete-a tu it. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: Change Multisite Configuration
entry.translation: Chunge-a Moolteesite-a Cunffeegooreshun

entry.string:
THIS SITE IS ALREADY CONFIGURED AS THE MASTER MULTISITE SITE.

You should only make changes to this configuration, if
entry.translation:
THIS SITE IS ELREEDY CONFIGOoRED ES THE MESTER MOoLTISITE SITE.

Yuoo shuoold oonly meke-a chunges tu thees cunffeegooreshun, iff

entry.string: You need to add or change the domains or subdomains extensions that you wish to use with multisites.
entry.translation: Yuoo need tu edd oor chunge-a zee dumeeens oor soobdumeeens ixtenseeuns thet yuoo veesh tu use-a veet moolteesites. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: You want to change the Master Data directory where subsite information is held. Note that if you do this, you must move any existing site data from your old Master Data Directory to your new one manually. This module will not move it for you.
entry.translation: Yuoo vunt tu chunge-a zee Mester Deta durectury vhere-a soobseete-a inffurmeshun is held. Bork bork bork! Nute-a thet iff yuoo du thees, yuoo moost mufe-a uny ixeesting seete-a deta frum yuoor oold Mester Deta Durectury tu yuoor noo oone-a munooelly. Thees mudoole-a veell nut mufe-a it fur yuu. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: You need to change the server configuration to HTTP_HOST or SERVER_NAME. This should only be required if you chose the wrong setup the first time round, or in some instances, if there has been changes to the server configuration where you host your site.
entry.translation: Yuoo need tu chunge-a zee serfer cunffeegooreshun tu HTTP_HOST oor SERFER_NEME. Thees shuoold oonly be-a reqooured iff yuoo chuse-a zee vrung setoop zee furst teeme-a ruoond, oor in sume-a instunces, iff zeere-a hes beee chunges tu zee serfer cunffeegooreshun vhere-a yuoo hust yuoor seete-a.

entry.string: If you wish to continue with modifying your Multisites Configuration then
entry.translation: Iff yuoo veesh tu cunteenooe-a veet mudeeffying yuoor Moolteesites Cunffeegooreshun zeen

entry.string: If you are changing your Master SubSite Data folder, create this directory first, and make sure it is writable chmod 777.
entry.translation: Iff yuoo ere-a chungeeng yuoor Mester SoobSeete-a Deta fulder, creete-a thees durectury furst, und meke-a soore-a it is vreeteble-a chmud 777.

entry.string: Chmod 666 your main config.system.php file (in the main var directory) so this module can write to it. When the Master Multisite Configuration is finished, make sure you chmod 444 your master config.system.php!
entry.translation: Chmud 666 yuoor meeen cunffeeg.system.php feele-a (in zee meeen fer durectury) su thees mudoole-a cun vreete-a tu it. Um de hur de hur de hur. Vhee zee Mester Moolteesite-a Cunffeegooreshun is feenished, meke-a soore-a yuoo chmud 444 yuoor mester config.system.php!

entry.string: If you wish to remove Multisites totally from this site
entry.translation: Iff yuoo veesh tu remufe-a Moolteesites tutelly frum thees seete

entry.string: Chmod 666 /var/config.system.php. Deactivate and Remove the Multisites module in Administration - Modules - View All. Once deactivated, remember to chmod your config.system.php file back to 444.
entry.translation: Chmud 666 /var/config.system.php. Deecteefete-a und Remufe-a zee Moolteesites mudoole-a in Edmeenistreshun - Mudooles - Feeoo Ell. Oonce-a deecteefeted, remeembur tu chmud yuoor config.system.php feele-a beck tu 444.

entry.string: The Master Data Folder and subsite subdirectories are not removed by this action, and must be removed manually if required.
entry.translation: Zee Mester Deta Fulder und soobseete-a soobdurectureees ere-a nut remufed by thees ecshun, und moost be-a remufed munooelly iff reqooured. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Server Configuration
entry.translation: Serfer Cunffeegooreshun

entry.string:
Multisites can use one of 2 possible variables, HTTP_HOST, or SERVER_NAME.
One or the other may not always work on your system, depending on the way your server is configured.
entry.translation:
Moolteesites cun use-a oone-a ooff 2 pusseeble-a fereeebles, HTTP_HOST, oor SERFER_NEME.
Oone-a oor zee oozeer mey nut elveys vurk oon yuoor system, dependeeng oon zee vey yuoor serfer is cunffeegoored. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Your SERVER_NAME value =
entry.translation: Yuoor SERFER_NEME felooe-a =

entry.string: Your HTTP_HOST value  =
entry.translation: Yuoor HTTP_HOST felooe-a  =

entry.string: HTTP_HOST
entry.translation: HTTP_HOST

entry.string: SERVER_NAME
entry.translation: SERFER_NEME

entry.string:
If the HTTP_HOST value above displays your correct domain name, you should make sure HTTP_HOST is selected from the drop down box.
If the domain name for HTTP_HOST is incorrect, only then, change the value in the drop down box to SERVER_NAME.
entry.translation:
Iff zee HTTP_HOST felooe-a ebufe-a deespleys yuoor currect dumeeen neme-a, yuoo shuoold meke-a soore-a HTTP_HOST is selected frum zee drup doon bux.
Iff zee dumeeen neme-a fur HTTP_HOST is incurrect, oonly zeen, chunge-a zee felooe-a in zee drup doon bux tu SERFER_NEME.

entry.string: File Paths & Domain Types
entry.translation: Feele-a Peths & Dumeeen Types

entry.string: All path names are relative to the directory where Xaraya is installed.
entry.translation: Ell pet nemes ere-a releteefe-a tu zee durectury vhere-a Xereya is instelled. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Default Theme Path
entry.translation: Deffoolt Zeeme-a Peth

entry.string: Default Var Path
entry.translation: Deffoolt Fer Peth

entry.string: Default Master Data Directory Path
entry.translation: Deffoolt Mester Deta Durectury Peth

entry.string: NOTE: Do not enter trailing slashes.
entry.translation: NOTE: Du nut inter treeeling sleshes. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Domain & subdomain extensions
entry.translation: Dumeeen & soobdumeeen ixtenseeuns

entry.string: Separate each by a comma (,)
entry.translation: Seperete-a iech by a cumma (,)

entry.string: The common extensions are .com, .net, .org. However, if for example you use a subdomain or domain such as www.domain.biz as a site, you will need to add the .biz extension to the list.
entry.translation: Zee cummun ixtenseeuns ere-a .com, .net, .org. Hooefer, iff fur ixemple-a yuoo use-a a soobdumeeen oor dumeeen sooch es www.domain.biz es a seete-a, yuoo veell need tu edd zee .biz ixtenseeun tu zee leest. Um de hur de hur de hur.
